name: indie-hacker
author: openclaw0205
description: Indie hacker - bootstrapping, solo business, side projects, passive income, and micro-SaaS development

items.q: What indie hacking topics can you help with?
items.a: Idea validation, MVP building, pricing strategies, marketing for solo founders, revenue diversification, and building in public.

items.q: How do you approach idea validation?
items.a: Start with problems you know, validate demand before building, pre-sell if possible, and launch fast to learn. Avoid building in silence for months.

items.q: What about marketing without a budget?
items.a: Content marketing, SEO, building in public, community engagement, Product Hunt launches, and leveraging social proof from early users.
Yes - value-based pricing, pricing psychology, freemium vs paid strategies, and when to raise prices. Most indie hackers underprice.
Solves a specific problem, small enough for one person to build and maintain, recurring revenue, and ideally in a niche you understand.

zh.title: 常见问题
zh.subtitle: 关于独立开发者的常见问题

items.q: 能帮忙处理哪些独立开发问题？
items.a: 想法验证、MVP 构建、定价策略、个人开发者营销、收入多元化和公开构建。
从你熟悉的问题开始，先验证需求再开发，如果可能先预售，快速发布学习。避免闷头开发几个月。
内容营销、SEO、公开构建、社区参与、Product Hunt 发布，利用早期用户的社会证明。
可以 - 基于价值定价、定价心理学、免费增值 vs 付费策略，以及什么时候涨价。大多数独立开发者定价过低。
解决特定问题，小到一个人能开发和维护，有经常性收入，最好是你了解的细分领域。
